arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِيْ جَعَلَ كَمَالَ دِينِهِ
عَلِيِّ بْنِ أَبِيْ طَالِبٍ عَلَيْهِ السَّلاَمُ
translation: All praise be to Allah Who has made the perfection of His religion
and the completion of His grace
in the leadership of the Commander of the Believers,
`Ali the son of Abu-Talib, peace be upon him.
transliteration: al ḥamdu lillāhil ladhī ja`ala kamāla dīnih
